tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE plastic_waste_compliance (
  industry_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  industry_name STRING,
  total_plastic_waste_kg DECIMAL,
  compliance_status BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE audit_records (
  audit_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  industry_id UUID,
  audit_date DATE,
  audit_score DECIMAL,
  audit_notes TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (industry_id) REFERENCES industry_compliance(industry_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ComplianceRecords (
  record_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  industry_id INT NOT NULL,
  regulatory_id INT NOT NULL,
  compliance_date DATE,
  compliance_result TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE industries (
  industry_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  industry_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  compliance_status VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE plastic_waste (
  waste_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  waste_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  weight DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
  industry_id INT NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (industry_id) REFERENCES industries(industry_id)
)

CREATE TABLE inspections (
  inspection_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  inspection_date DATE NOT NULL,
  inspector_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  waste_id INT NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (waste_id) REFERENCES plastic_waste(waste_id)
)

CREATE TABLE penalties (
  penalty_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  penalty_amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
  penalty_reason TEXT,
  inspection_id INT NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (inspection_id) REFERENCES inspections(inspection_id)
)

CREATE TABLE industry_regulations (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  industry_name VARCHAR(255),
  compliance_status BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE waste_management (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  waste_type VARCHAR(100),
  weight DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE accountability_records (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  record_date TIMESTAMP,
  status VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE employee_tracking (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  employee_name VARCHAR(255),
  department VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE audit_logs (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  log_date TIMESTAMP,
  action_taken TEXT
)
